name: One-Pot Salmon, Asparagus, and Feta Pasta
author: Diana Moutsopoulos
summary: If you hate doing dishes and love quick family-friendly meals, this recipe is for you! Just a few ingredients are needed and any short pasta shape will work well.
ingredients: ½ bunch asparagus, trimmed and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Add salmon and poach until it flakes easily with a fork, about 5 minutes
Remove salmon and set aside to cool
Add pasta to the boiling water and cook until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Add asparagus during the last 3 minutes of cooking
Drain, reserving 1/3 cup of cooking liquid
Return pasta and asparagus to the pot
Flake salmon into the pan, then add feta cheese, olive oil, salt, and pepper
Place over medium-low heat and gently stir to combine with the pasta and asparagus, adding a little of the reserved cooking water as needed to achieve a creamy consistency
